properties.address: The Red House, Golf Lane, Aldeburgh IP15 5PZ, UK
properties.description: Warm Room offered byBritten Pears Arts as part of East Suffolk Council's Ease the Squeeze campaign to help residents with the cost of living. Our Warm Rooms are safe, welcoming and staffed heated spaces that are conveniently located for our local community. There will hot drinks available for free, and microwave to heat any food you would like to bring. There will be books, board games, jigsaws and other items to keep you entertained. Everyone will be welcome and respected in our Warm Rooms.
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Warm Room in the Imogen Holst Room at The Red House

properties.description: Our Hut is a Warm Hub. Leave your own heating on low and come to the Hut for a WARM UP. Have a hot cuppa, or a soup lunch or bowl of stew. Read the papers or a book. Share your thoughts and put the world to rights. Just for an hour - bring a game to share. Get hooked on a jigsaw and stay all day. Scrabble or cards, chess or cribbage - whatever you like. Bring your work, weâll have Wi-fi! Make yourself at home, thereâs time for a chat. Tea and Cake? Or just pop in to say Hello. But above all - keep warm! No charges for drinks - food for a donation.
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Hygge at The Hut, Sweffling
